source_objects.description: Learn human resources with courses ranging from oracle human capital management to attracting, hiring and retaining the best people.

items.title: IT for recruiters and talent management professionals

Stand out as a recruiter because of your solid IT basic knowledge
Truly bond with your audience and have long term business relationships
